Articles.Content:
I have mission to test lv-909 engine in orbit, you use to click on it to "test". That does not happen, how do you test in 1.0 ?

Edited April 29, 2015 by Lohan2008

Part tests either ask you to righ click and run test or they ask you to test the part by activating it with staging. I expect this is one of the staging ones

You should be able to create a new stage while in flight, drag the engine into it and use the spacebar to stage.

You can do this even for engines that have already been activated.
